perfumes.title: Dior J'adore Eau de Parfum
perfumes.description: An iconic House of Dior perfume for women, J'adore Eau de Parfum is an irresistibly seductive floral composition.

perfumes.title: Chanel Coco Mademoiselle Eau de Parfum
perfumes.description: An absolutely modern composition with a strong yet surprisingly fresh character. Sparks of fresh and vibrant Orange immediately awaken the senses.

perfumes.title: Tom Ford Black Orchid Eau de Parfum
perfumes.top notes: TTruffle, Mandarin orange and Amalfi lemon.
perfumes.description: Black Orchid Eau De Parfum opens with aphrodisiacal black truffle and narcotic ylang ylang—touched with effervescent bergamot and bitter orange. Rum-soaked, sweet black plum surrounds the perfume‘s black orchid extract, while woody patchouli and creamy vanilla wrap the orchid in rich warmth.

perfumes.title: Good Girl
perfumes.description: This floral perfume entwines iris, patchouli, and Arabian jasmine sambac with sweet notes of orange blossom, warm vanilla, and spun sugar.
